item.description: 【This is a guest blog from Toine de Boer. This blog takes a look at the Android side of the interactive widget created in the previous blog on iOS Widgets. Android is gen】这是 Toine de Boer 的客座博客。本博客介绍了上一篇关于 iOS Widgets 的博客中创建的交互式小部件的 Android 端。安卓是一代

item.title: 【Aspire for JavaScript developers】Aspire JavaScript 开发者
item.description: 【Remember when Aspire was just for .NET folks? Yeah, those days are over. With Aspire 13, JavaScript and TypeScript developers get to join the party—and I'm not talking about some half-baked afterthought integration. This is first-class, full-featured support for orchestrating your JavaScript apps in distributed systems. [alert typ】还记得 Aspire 只适合 .NET 用户吗？是的，那些日子已经结束了。借助 Aspire 13，JavaScript 和 TypeScript 开发人员可以加入这个行列，我并不是在谈论一些不成熟的事后集成。这是对在分布式系统中编排 JavaScript 应用程序的一流的全功能支持。 [警报类型

item.title: 【How We Synchronize .NET's Virtual Monorepo】我们如何同步 .NET 的虚拟 Monorepo
item.description: 【In our previous post "Reinventing how .NET Builds and Ships", Matt covered our recent overhaul of .NET's building and shipping processes. A key part of this multi-year effort, which we called Unified Build, is the introduction of the Vi】在我们之前的文章“重新定义 .NET 的构建和交付方式”中，Matt 介绍了我们最近对 .NET 的构建和交付流程的彻底改革。这项多年努力的关键部分（我们称之为“统一构建”）是 Vi 的引入

item.title: 【Clipping the focus item when looking for its on-screen location】在寻找焦点项目在屏幕上的位置时剪切焦点项目

item.title: 【Using Active Accessibility to find out where the focus item is】使用 Active Accessibility 找出焦点项目在哪里

item.title: 【Using Active Accessibility to find out where the Windows caret is】使用 Active Accessibility 找出 Windows 插入符号的位置
item.description: 【Last time, we learned how to query the global caret position, but we found that it works only for programs that use the system caret. Fancy programs think that the system caret is old and stodgy and prefer t】上次，我们学习了如何查询全局插入符位置，但我们发现它仅适用于使用系统插入符的程序。花哨的程序认为系统插入符是旧的、古板的，并且更喜欢

item.title: 【The Realities of Application Modernization with Agentic AI (Early 2026)】利用代理 AI 实现应用程序现代化的现实（2026 年初）
